##Packages
```{r}
library(raster)
library(rgeos)
library(rgdal)
library(sp)
```

##Load data
```{r}
out_raster <- raster("../outputs/bb_EM_mod2a_wmean.tif")
plot(out_raster)
```

#recode raster 

to split into 95 and 99.5
```{r}
#reclassification matrix: 
out_raster
from <- c(0, 950, 995)
to <- c(950, 995, 1000)
becomes <- c(0, 1, 2)
rcl_m <- cbind(from, to, becomes)


out_raster_rec <- reclassify(out_raster, rcl = rcl_m)
plot(out_raster_rec)

#export
writeRaster(out_raster_rec, "../outputs/bb_EM_mod2a_wmean_categorised.tif")
```

#convert to polygon
I did this in QGIS

used tool Polygonize to convert to polygons
used tool fill holes (with threshold 15000) to remove small parcels

saved as `outputs/blanket_bog_potential_YD_EM2a.shp`
